insert into t_lsc_goods (c_desc, c_format, c_brand, c_comp, c_class, c_bunit, f_expiration, c_code, c_qrcode, f_pprice, f_sprice) values (#{cDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cComp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cBunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fExpiration,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cQrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fPprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fSprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update t_lsc_goods set c_desc = #{cDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_format = #{cFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_brand = #{cBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_comp = #{cComp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_class = #{cClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_bunit = #{cBunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_expiration = #{fExpiration,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, c_code = #{cCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_qrcode = #{cQrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_pprice = #{fPprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_sprice = #{fSprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select c_id, c_desc, c_format, c_brand, c_comp, c_class, c_bunit, f_expiration, c_code, c_qrcode, f_pprice, f_sprice from t_lsc_goods where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
